2.caption: 1938 Major League Baseball All-Star Game
2.description: The 1938 Major League Baseball All-Star Game was the sixth playing of the mid-summer classic between the all-stars of the American League (AL) and National League (NL), the two leagues comprising Major League Baseball. The game was held on July 6, 1938, at Crosley Field in Cincinnati, Ohio, the home of the Cincinnati Reds of the National League. The game resulted in the National League defeating the American League 4–1.
2.inspected:Radio announcers: Bob Elson, Dick Bray (Mutual)Bill Dyer, France Laux (CBS)Tom Manning, Red Barber (NBC)
